metadata.title: CVE-2025-0194 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 17.4 prior to 17.5.5, starting from 17.6 prior to 17.6.3, and startingfrom 17.7 prior to 17.7.1. Under certain conditions, access tokens may havebeen logged when API requests were made in a specific manner.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
